bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of da feng 大風② , massive wind, disease with red and black papules on the skin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lü cao 葎草 quotes Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 : 烏癩風瘡，葛葎草三秤切洗。 益母草一秤切，以水二石五斗，煮取一石五斗，去滓入瓮中，浸浴一時 方出，坐密室中。又暖湯浴一時，乃出，暖臥取汗，勿令見風。明日又 浴。如浴時瘙癢不可忍，切勿搔動，少頃漸定。後隔三日一作，以愈為 度 , “ Black repudiation-illness wind sores : Ge and lü cao : 3 cheng each, cut and wash. Yi mu cao , 1 cheng , cut. Add water, 2 stones and 5 dou , and boil down to 1 stone and five dou . Discard the dregs and [fill the liquid] into an earthen jar. Soak [the afflicted body part in the liquid] for a while and then take it out again. [Have the patient] sit in a closely sealed room, and again have him bathe in the warm liquid for a while, and then get out again. Have him lie down, warmly covered, until he sweats. He must not be touched by wind. The next day have him bathe again. When [the skin] itches while he his bathing, he must not scratch even if it is unbearable. Slowly [the disease] will be checked. Later the therapy is to be applied every third day. It ends when a cure is achieved”.
